name: Data Labelling Center
description: Empowering AI through human precision.
Our Data Labeling Center combines expert annotation and intelligent tools to deliver clean, accurate, and scalable datasets for cutting-edge machine learning
We help researchers and industry partners turn raw data into reliable, AI-ready training sets through precise annotation, cleaning, and preprocessing.
We offer:
Precise data annotation across a wide range of data types.
Specialized labeling services, including semantic segmentation, bounding boxes for object detection, and key-point annotation for pose estimation.
Data cleaning and quality assurance to eliminate errors and inconsistencies that may hinder model performance.
Preprocessing and data preparation, such as normalization, transformation, and handling of missing values.
AI-assisted labeling tools that enhance human productivity, increase efficiency, and reduce costs.
Custom tool development, tailored to specific data formats, project goals, or industrial requirements.

name: Conformity Center
description: AI Conformity Center
Building trust in AI through validation, compliance, and transparency.

The AI Conformity Center supports researchers and companies - especially small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) - in ensuring that their AI systems meet the safety, transparency, and accountability standards required by the EU AI Act and the National AI Strategy 2024–2027.
Our mission is to help organizations develop responsible and compliant AI systems that inspire trust and create competitive advantage.
We provide:
Conformity assessment for high-risk AI systems;
Risk management and technical documentation support;
Tools for continuous monitoring and compliance across the AI lifecycle;
Training and advisory services on ethical AI and regulatory requirements.
Through these services, the center helps transform compliance into an engine for innovation, ensuring AI technologies are developed and deployed safely, ethically, and successfully.
